thread.title_full: 5 day stay New York - Review of Novotel New York Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: blissPortTalbot
title: 5 day stay New York -
text: We stayed at the Novotel Times Square for 5 days, check in was quick and easy, the room was large with two double beds, a kettle and coffee machine was brought to room within 10 minutes, the staff are eager to help with any enquiries, the hotel is in an excellent position to Times Square, we felt relaxed in the hotel, there was a fridge and safe, iron, hair dryer, we would defiantly stay here if we visit New York again.
